WorkItem.Description:
Hallo,

i've some problems to setup chirpy for my .net ajax application.
the problem is that chirpy renames all methode and object names.

i tried to use the ms ajax minifier by setting the default javascript minifier
to Microsoft Ajax toolkit, also i have unchecked all options 
in the ms js ajax minifier tab for testing purpose, but i don't see any effect.
chirpy still renames/minifies all names which destroys my ajax callbacks.

so my suggestion here is an exclude list for function and object names,
this keeps the minifier power of chirpy and saves my callbacks.

last but not least i'd like to know where chirpy stores it's config file, i was not able to find it.

btw: i've installed the latest chirpy version 2.04 and overwrote all dlls
in the addin folder of visual studio with the latest dlls out of your source.

Comments.Message:
Test with closure compiler simple or white space only.

https://developers.google.com/closure/compiler/docs/compilation_levels
